page.title: 08ONE ADULTS DAY
page.content: JUNE 23rd 1985 08.30 Get up,wash,clean teeth. 09.00 Go over mums,come back,have a drink,read Sunday Mirror 09.30 Sit in back garden 10.00 Looking for shelf brackets 12.00 Lay table,waiting for dinner, reading 12.30 Have dinner,feed dog 14.00 Watching SUNDAY Grandstand 14.30 Fixing car 15.30 Fault located 16.00 Go to scrapyard to get new fuel tank 16.30 Put in fuel tank 17.30 Feed ducks 18.00 Go to pub 19.00 Watching television 19.30 Making a drink,resting 21.00 Watching film 22.00 Lock up and go to bed BY:BRIAN KEARVELL
